sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Services from '../components/services/Services'; import { FaGraduationCap, FaPassport, FaUniversity, FaLanguage, FaCheck } from 'react-icons/fa'; const services = [ { id: "study-abroad", icon: , title: "Study Abroad Consultation", description: "Expert guidance on choosing the right country, university, and program for your academic goals.", features: [ "Country and university selection", "Program matching based on your profile", "Scholarship and funding guidance", "Cultural adaptation support" ] }, { id: "visa", icon: , title: "Visa Application Guidance", description: "Comprehensive support for visa applications, documentation, and interview preparation.", features: [ "Document checklist and preparation", "Application form assistance", "Interview preparation", "Post-approval guidance" ] }, { id: "admission", icon: , title: "University Admission Support", description: "Personalized assistance with university applications, essays, and admission requirements.", features: [ "Application strategy development", "Personal statement review", "Recommendation letter guidance", "Portfolio preparation" ] }, { id: "language", icon: , title: "Language Training", description: "Specialized language courses to help you meet the language requirements of your chosen program.", features: [ "IELTS/TOEFL preparation", "Academic writing skills", "Speaking and listening practice", "Test-taking strategies" ] } ]; const ServicesPage = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Our Services

Comprehensive support for your educational journey, from initial consultation to successful admission.

{/* Services Grid */}
{services.map((service, index) => (
{service.icon}

{service.title}

{service.description}

    {service.features.map((feature, featureIndex) => (
  • {feature}
    • ))}
))}
{/* Process Section */}

Our Process

We follow a structured approach to ensure your success at every step.

1

Initial Consultation

Understanding your goals and requirements

2

Profile Assessment

Evaluating your academic background and preferences

3

Application Support

Guiding you through the application process

4

Post-Admission

Supporting your transition to university life

{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Start Your Journey?

Contact us today to learn more about our services and how we can help you achieve your academic goals.

Get in Touch
); }; export default ServicesPage;
